All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Context
This class is responsible for creating an instance of the Model class and storing it as an attribute in the ServletContext.
ControllerServlet
The ControllerServlet class handles user requests for hexadecimal to decimal and decimal to hexadecimal conversions.
ConversionException
Custom exception class representing the scenario when no provided value can be converted by any means
Database
The Database class provides functionality to interact with a Derby database.
HexFinalValueCount
Interface for calculating the final hex value.
HistoryServlet
The HistoryServlet class displays the conversion history and total visit count.
Model
Conversion hex to dec and dec to hex This class provides methods for converting hexadecimal to decimal and decimal to hexadecimal.
